chunk:
Bionyx Platinum Intense Eye Serum

Brand: Bionyx

Category: Serums & Essences

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Trehalose, Betaine, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Triethanolamine, Allantoin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil,Disodium Edta, Sodium Heparin, Caffeine, Colloidal Platinum, Siloxanetriol Alginate, Beta-Glucan

Directions: Step 1: Pump a single bead of serum on fingertip
Step 2: Gently tap or massage product into undereye from inner corner to outer corner

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
